front.title: Native NAT Traversal Mode for the Host Identity Protocol

abstract.t: This document specifies a new Network Address Translator (NAT)traversal mode for the Host Identity Protocol (HIP). The new mode isbased on the Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) methodologyand UDP encapsulation of data and signaling traffic. The maindifference from the previously specified modes is the use of HIPmessages for all NAT traversal procedures.
